efforts.name: Documentation Strategy
efforts.description: Create a comprehensive documentation strategy for your team

projects.name: Team Documentation Plan
projects.description: Create a plan for team documentation

tasks.title: ⭐ Define documentation needs
tasks.description: Identify what documentation your team needs. Consider user guides, API docs, internal docs, and training materials.

tasks.title: Assign documentation owners
tasks.description: Assign team members to own different documentation areas. Define responsibilities and ensure coverage.

tasks.title: Set documentation standards
tasks.description: Establish style guides and templates. Ensure consistency across all documentation.

tasks.title: Choose documentation tools
tasks.description: Select tools for creating and managing documentation. Consider collaboration features and ease of use.

tasks.title: Create documentation workflow
tasks.description: Define process for creating, reviewing, and updating documentation. Ensure documentation stays current.

tasks.title: Plan documentation structure
tasks.description: Design logical structure for documentation. Organize content for easy navigation and discovery.

tasks.title: ⭐ Write getting started guide
tasks.description: Create a guide for new team members. Include setup, workflows, key concepts, and common tasks.

tasks.title: Document team processes
tasks.description: Write down your team's processes and workflows. Include decision-making, communication, and collaboration processes.

tasks.title: Create user-facing docs
tasks.description: Write documentation for end users. Make it clear, accessible, and focused on user needs.

tasks.title: Build troubleshooting guides
tasks.description: Create guides for common issues and problems. Help users solve problems independently.

tasks.title: Establish documentation review
tasks.description: Set up a process for reviewing and updating documentation regularly. Keep content current and accurate.

tasks.title: Create documentation index
tasks.description: Build an index or table of contents for easy navigation. Help users find what they need quickly.

efforts.name: User Guides & Training
efforts.description: Create guides and training materials for users

tasks.title: ⭐ Identify user personas
tasks.description: Define different user personas. Understand their needs, goals, and technical levels to tailor guides.

tasks.title: Create quick start guides
tasks.description: Write quick start guides for common tasks. Help users get started quickly with step-by-step instructions.

tasks.title: Build feature guides
tasks.description: Document each major feature in detail. Explain what it does, how to use it, and when to use it.

tasks.title: Create best practices guides
tasks.description: Document best practices and recommendations. Help users avoid common mistakes and follow proven patterns.

tasks.title: Add examples and use cases
tasks.description: Include real-world examples and use cases. Show users how features solve actual problems.

tasks.title: Make guides accessible
tasks.description: Ensure guides are easy to find and use. Use clear language, visuals, and good formatting.

projects.name: Training Materials
projects.description: Develop training materials for different audiences

tasks.title: ⭐ Assess training needs
tasks.description: Evaluate what training different user groups need. Consider skill levels and learning preferences.

tasks.title: Create beginner tutorials
tasks.description: Write tutorials for beginners. Start with basics and build complexity gradually. Include hands-on exercises.

tasks.title: Build intermediate tutorials
tasks.description: Create tutorials for intermediate users. Cover more advanced topics and complex workflows.

tasks.title: Create video tutorials
tasks.description: Produce video tutorials for visual learners. Cover key workflows and common tasks in video format.

tasks.title: Develop training exercises
tasks.description: Create hands-on exercises for training. Let users practice what they learn with guided activities.

tasks.title: Gather training feedback
tasks.description: Collect feedback on training materials. Improve based on user questions and confusion points.

efforts.name: Community Building
efforts.description: Build and engage with user community

tasks.title: ⭐ Set up community channels
tasks.description: Create spaces for community interaction: forums, chat, or discussion groups. Choose platforms that fit your users.

tasks.title: Create community guidelines
tasks.description: Establish guidelines for community participation. Set expectations for behavior and content.

tasks.title: Engage with community members
tasks.description: Actively participate in community discussions. Answer questions, share tips, and build relationships.

tasks.title: Organize community events
tasks.description: Plan and host community events: webinars, office hours, or meetups. Bring users together.

tasks.title: Highlight community contributions
tasks.description: Showcase work from community members. Feature examples, case studies, and success stories.

tasks.title: Gather community feedback
tasks.description: Collect feedback from community. Understand user needs, pain points, and feature requests.

projects.name: Content Creation
projects.description: Create content to educate and engage users

tasks.title: ⭐ Plan content strategy
tasks.description: Develop a content strategy. Plan blog posts, videos, and other content that educates and engages users.

tasks.title: Write blog posts
tasks.description: Create blog posts on relevant topics. Share tips, case studies, platform updates, and best practices.

tasks.title: Create example projects
tasks.description: Build example projects that showcase platform capabilities. Provide code and documentation for users to learn from.

tasks.title: Produce video content
tasks.description: Create video content: demos, walkthroughs, and tutorials. Reach visual learners and provide engaging content.

tasks.title: Share success stories
tasks.description: Document and share success stories. Show how others are using the platform effectively.

tasks.title: Maintain content calendar
tasks.description: Plan and schedule regular content. Keep users engaged with consistent, valuable content.
